name: 林懷恩
objective:
本課程共分為八個主題，包含簡述感測器之分類及近年技術發展趨勢，及六大常見感測器類別之介紹 (如光電感測器、磁感測器、濕度感測器、溫度感測器、超音波感測器、及壓力感測器等)，此外也將講述 MEMS 技術於微型感測器之應用及電子感官分析裝置。
This course is divided into eight topics, including an overview of sensor classifications and recent technological development trends, as well as an introduction to six common types of sensors (such as photoelectric sensors, magnetic sensors, humidity sensors, temperature sensors, ultrasonic transducers, and pressure sensors). Additionally, the course will cover the application of MEMS technology in micro-sensors, electronic sensory analysis devices, and smart sensing applications integrated with IoT technology.
schedule:
第 1 週	課程內容簡介 Course introduction 
第 2 週	感測器概述、分類、與原理
Precision Theory
第 3 週	光電式感測器介紹 (光二極體、光電晶體、光敏電阻、紅外光感測器、光耦合器、光斷路器、編碼器等)
Introduction to Photoelectric Sensors (including photodiodes, phototransistors, photoresistors, infrared sensors, optocouplers, optical interrupters, and encoders).
第 4 週	光電式感測器介紹 (光二極體、光電晶體、光敏電阻、紅外光感測器、光耦合器、光斷路器、編碼器等)
Introduction to Photoelectric Sensors (including photodiodes, phototransistors, photoresistors, infrared sensors, optocouplers, breakers, and encoders).
第 5 週	光電式感測器介紹 (光二極體、光電晶體、光敏電阻、紅外光感測器、光耦合器、光斷路器、編碼器等)
Introduction to Photoelectric Sensors (including photodiodes, phototransistors, photoresistors, infrared sensors, optocouplers, breakers, and encoders).
第 6 週	磁感測器與微機電感測器 (霍爾元件、磁阻元件、渦電流式近接感測器、差動變壓器、SQUID、磁抗效應感測器、磁柵尺)
Magnetic Sensors and MEMS Sensors (including Hall elements, magnetoresistive elements, eddy current proximity sensors, differential transformers, SQUIDs, magneto-impedance sensors, and magnescale).
第 7 週	磁感測器與微機電感測器 (霍爾元件、磁阻元件、渦電流式近接感測器、差動變壓器、SQUID、磁抗效應感測器、磁柵尺)
Magnetic Sensors and MEMS Sensors (including Hall elements, magnetoresistive elements, eddy current proximity sensors, differential transformers, SQUIDs, magneto-impedance sensors, and magnescale).
第 8 週	濕度感測器 (電阻型與電容型濕度感測)
Humidity Sensors (Resistive and Capacitive Humidity Sensing).
第 9 週	期中考 Middle examination
第 10 週	溫度感測器 (金屬測溫電阻、熱敏電阻、IC 溫度感測器)
Temperature Sensors (Metal RTDs, Thermistors, and IC Temperature Sensors).
第 11 週	超音波感測器與壓電感測器 (超音波原理、壓電效應、超音波震盪電路、受信電路)
Ultrasonic transducers and Piezoelectric Sensors (Ultrasonic Principles, Piezoelectric Effect, Ultrasonic Oscillation Circuits, and Receiving Circuits).
第 12 週	超音波感測器與壓電感測器 (超音波原理、壓電效應、超音波震盪電路、受信電路)
Ultrasonic transducers and Piezoelectric Sensors (Ultrasonic Principles, Piezoelectric Effect, Ultrasonic Oscillation Circuits, and Receiving Circuits).
第 13 週	壓力感測器 (半導體型壓力感測器、驅動電路、放大電路、加速度感測器)
Pressure Sensors (Semiconductor Pressure Sensors, Drive Circuits, Amplifier Circuits, and Accelerometers).
第 14 週	壓力感測器 (半導體型壓力感測器、驅動電路、放大電路、加速度感測器)
Pressure Sensors (Semiconductor Pressure Sensors, Drive Circuits, Amplifier Circuits, and Accelerometers).
第 15 週	官感測器 (電子感官分析)
Sensory Sensors (Electronic Sensory Analysis).
第 16 週	智慧感測系統規劃與設計實務
Smart Sensing System Planning and Practical Design.
第 17 週	智慧感測與物聯網實務案例分享 (鐵道領域系統應用)
Case Studies of Smart Sensing and IoT Applications (Railway System Applications).
第 18 週	期末考 Final Examination
